com.thomasdiewald.pixelflow.java.imageprocessing

Class DwFlowField

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thomasdiewald.pixelflow.java.imageprocessing.DwFlowField

  • public class DwFlowField
extends java.lang.Object
    Builds a gradient image from a given input.
    The gradient is stored in a two-channel float texture.

    This class includes some GLSL programs for rendering:
    • Velocity Pixel Shader
    • Velocity Line Shader
    • Line Integral Convolution - LIC
    Author:
    Thomas Diewald
